Articles.Content:
"...because ion engines are as powerful as a mouse fart..." -Scott Manly

THE ION CHALLENGE!!!!!

Ion engines are great for interplanetary probes, but has been rejected by everyone, due to it's very very VERY low thrust, and has been limeted to probes and solar aircraft. The challenge is simple. Make an Ion Rocket that can get to orbit. If that is impossible than you can take the easier challenges. Ion rover and ion plane.

Due to my sudden relization that it is not possible to launch from kerbin ( thanks guys ) you can do it on the mun, hyper edit to it, legit, Just launch there. However rovers and planes still on kerbin until further notice.

Rules 

no cheating (duh)

no mods that help ion engines.

Everything is rated by speed or/and speed.

no rover wheels 

Ion Rocket

Ion Plane

Ion rover

This isn't possible on Kerbin. The engine itself has a TWR < 1. If you mean a moon with no atmosphere, or Dres, Eeloo, and maybe Moho, then that's possible.

Yes, ion rockets launching from Kerbin are impossible due to TWR.
